text: Takheun leh bak jih jinoe tapeugah Saboh hai mantong Lon bri nasehat Tadong tahadap keudeh bak Allah Got dua-dua teuh got sidroe-droe Tapike jinoe peue nyang peurintah Rakan geutanyoe keubit kon gila Tapi geujakba peurintah Allah Keu bandum gata geujak peuingat Azeub saket that hana ban peugah Azeub nyang brat that keu gata dudoe
